overview: Witness the making of a legend, vintage Rocco from archived European video vaults! In this French feature, Rocco and his partner, Carolyn, are on the prowl to bust adultering spouses. How do they do this? Well, who do you think the philandering spouses are sleeping with? It's a Rocco classic, featuring loads of hot, all-natural European girls!
title: Rocco's Cravings
